original_text: Get thee unto Pharaoh in the morning; lo, he goeth out unto the water; and thou shalt stand by the river's brink against he come; and the rod which was turned to a serpent shalt thou take in thine hand.
korean_text: 아침에 너는 바로에게로 가라 보라 그가 물 있는 곳으로 나오리니 너는 나일 강 가에 서서 그를 맞으며 그 뱀 되었던 지팡이를 손에 잡고

sentences.original_text: Get thee unto Pharaoh in the morning
lo, he goeth out unto the water
and thou shalt stand by the river's brink
and the rod which was turned to a serpent
shalt thou take in thine hand
